EmailTemplate.name: IMC and MBO Partners (1341948920.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: IMC and MBO Partners (1341948920.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Mike, Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Raymond Suarez at IMC. He passed along your email reguaring finding at CPA and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1ROvFNi5vmVLa3kmhXNe5vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to see if it is something that you might find valuable. If you are intrested in speaking, you may schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1ROvFNi5vmVLa3kmhXNe5vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Addtionally, I will be going to the IMC networking event <http://www.imcusa.org/members/group.aspx?id=38605> on Thursday as well, not sure if you are planning on attending but perhaps we could speak there as well. I look forward to connecting with you, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1ROvFNi5vmVLa3kmhXNe5vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1ROvFNi5vmVLa3kmhXNe5vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1ROvFNi5vmVLa3kmhXNe5vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
